STBLKeyStringList.Text: Have a Sim reach max level in the Detective career.
Have a Sim reach max level in the Doctor career.
Have a Sim reach max level in the Scientist career.
Perform surgery successfully on an Alien.
Have Sims be abducted by aliens 3 times.
Have a Sim die while running a store.
Have an alien in disguise marry a Sim without them knowing their secret.
Have a male Sim give birth to an Alien baby
Make a scientific breakthrough while taking a shower.
Have a Sim reach max level in the Baking skill.
Have a Sim reach max level in the Photography skill.

Hear Hear! You helped and treated all patients. Pats on the back! You did a great job. Now it's time to go back to work. There are more patients to treat. Click on your Sim and select Return to Hospital to go back to work.
Congratulations! The doctor has prepared the birth certificate.
Nice work! That's one more criminal off the streets. Unfortunately crime never sleeps and we have another case waiting for you. Get the assignment from a computer and get back out there!
This will bring the aliens around; maybe they'll even abduct us!
This will keep the aliens from abducting us for sure!
{0.SimName} is feeling very much under the weather. Better have {M0.him}{F0.her} stay home at this point.
The suspect has had enough and become unresponsive before you could determine their guilt or innocence. You'll have to let them go for now.
The suspect appears to be guilty! It's time to put this criminal behind bars.
The suspect appears to be innocent and can be released!

A suspect fitting the APB description has been spotted in this area!

Ask around to see if anyone can point you toward the suspect.

Use the Notebook to review the suspect description before you make an arrest. If you arrest the wrong person, it won't look good on your record.

You have processed enough clues to issue an All Points Bulletin (APB). While you have a rough description of the suspect, the more clues you find and process, the more specific the description becomes. When you have a very detailed description of the perp, the less likely you will be to arrest an innocent who shares a few similarities with the guilty party.

At a Crime Scene, you can find clues that will help you track down a suspect.

Investigate damaged or stolen objects and Search for Clues on the ground nearby to uncover more evidence.

Also, talk with Witnesses to get a report about what happened.
It's time to start fighting crime!\n\nFirst things first, use a computer to get a case assignment.

There's still a bit more to learn before you'll be ready for your own case.

First, it's time to get out into the community and start building your reputation as a friendly protector or hardened authority figure.

After that, you'll get to take a shot at finding and arresting a suspect.

Get a move on, rookie!

Your training is complete and it's time to run your own case.

You'll have to gather evidence, uncover clues, track down your suspect, and get them to confess to their crimes.

This isn't an easy job, but if you do it well, you'll be making the community a safer place for everyone.

Good luck, detective.

When an officer is on patrol, they can get to know the community and help keep troublemakers in check.

Talk with residents to make a friendly (or mean) impression.

If you see anyone littering or fighting, issue a citation to make sure they obey the law.

Now that you've learned about work out in the world, you should know that there's plenty to do around the station too.

Run criminals through the Booking Station, take Crime Reports from civilians, and get to know your Co-workers.

You can also use the gym upstairs to stay fit or browse the database on a computer to bolster your knowledge of the criminal mind.
Uh… {1.SimName} is definitely NOT from this planet. Not sure what {M1.”It”} {F1.”It”} expects from this hospital visit, but let’s just carry on as if nothing strange is happening…

The scan is showing all of {1.SimName}’s organs in the wrong places. This could be indicative of a dire medical issue, or a malfunctioning machine. Either way, it is best not mention it until further test are done.

Code Watermelon: "A Pregnant Sim has just arrived at the reception area, ready to give birth! {0.SimFirstName}, please HURRY and prep for Baby delivery. Get her into the first available surgery table to perform the delivery.”

Paging {0.SimName}: "The pharmaceutical lab is over-tasked and has sent a batch of confidential tissue samples that require urgent analysis. Please collect the samples from the reception desk for immediate evaluation and data-recording.”
Alert! Aliens have infiltrated these headquarters and are trying to pass themselves as Humans. Very suspicious! Be on the lookout for them and any sabotaged equipment.

Today is an exciting day, assuming the Electroflux Wormhole Generator is built and operational. We have been given information that a special event is happening on the alien world. We should go check it out and represent our species well!
The laboratory is running low on supplies! You'll need to collect more specimens in order for the lab to continue research. Keep your eyes peeled! But not too peeled.

Welcome to FutureSim Labs! You'll be quite busy conducting essential experiments, researching new technology, and maybe even interacting with alien life. It is your job to leverage potent scientific equipment for the purposes of good. We hope. Well, welcome!
There comes a choice when one must become a benevolent scientician or a malefactor of knowledge. Good and Evil. That sort of thing. Will you help your fellow scientists? Or foil them at every turn?
{0.SimFirstName} invented an Electroflux Wormhole Generator. Where could it lead? What is on the other side? Drag the Portal off the Invention Constructor to find out.
{0.SimFirstName} invented a Cloning Machine. What can {M0.he}{F0.she} clone? Drag the Cloning Maching off the Invention Constructor, and then drag things onto it and select "Clone Object."
{0.SimFirstName} invented a Hover Lamp. Turn it on and break the laws of physics! Drag the Hover Lamp off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory to carry it around.
{0.SimFirstName} invented a Momentum Conserver. Turn it on and watch it spin! Drag the Momentum Conserver off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory to carry it around.
{0.SimFirstName} invented a Satellite Dish. What could be out there? Drag the Satellite Dish off the Invention Constructor to find out.

{0.SimFirstName} invented a SimRay. This device looks like a powerful Freeze ray. Give it a name! Then drag the SimRay off the Invention Constructor and into {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory, then select a Sim you want to Freeze and choose "Freeze Sim." Who knows what other ideas for the SimRay {0.SimFirstName} might have?
The company is so excited that they gave {0.SimFirstName} a new Alien Portal for the occasion.
Of course we love throwing Human Parties! Why do you think we're always visiting?
Let's get ready to SimRay! It's all about the SimRay today. Be prepared to transform, freeze, control minds, and up your rayness to the max. For science!
{0.SimFirstName} has enough clues to issue an APB at the Crime Map. Collecting more clues before issuing an APB will increase your ability to find the suspect.
A crime photo has been added to your inventory.
An evidence sample has been added to your inventory.
A fingerprint sample has been added to your inventory.
A witness report has been added to your inventory.
{0.SimFirstName} has become of Age! {M0.He}{F0.She} can now set {M0.his}{F0.her} own disguise.
The Sims were waiting forever for {0.SimFirstName} to answer the House Call, but {M0.he}{F0.she} never showed up. They finally gave up and drove to a different hospital to get treated.
The Outbreak kept spreading out of control because {0.SimFirstName} never showed up to contain it. Finally, the local government stepped in and contained the disease.
Looks like something went horribly wrong during synthesis. {0.SimFirstName} better be more careful next time.
Looks like something happened during synthesis. This serum looks a little tainted. {0.SimFirstName} should test it on someone else.
Success! {0.SimFirstName} has successfully created a Serum! Now all that's left to do is test it.
Success! {0.SimFirstName} has successfully created a tainted serum. Better test this on someone else. It looks a little off.

Welcome, {0.SimName}, to a vital and rewarding career in the field of medicine!\n\nBeing new to the job, take some time getting familiarized with the location, the people, and the basic responsibilities of the profession. In time, with skill, dedication and a passion to help {M0.his}{F0.her} fellow Sims, {0.SimFirstName} will no doubt go far in {M0.his}{F0.her} career.

Having a career in the health-care field seems to have caught up to some of {0.SimName}’s colleagues. With the staff of the medical venue reduced, more responsibility falls on {0.SimFirstName} to keep the place running smoothly.
Someone has called the Hospital asking for a Doctor to come to their house for help. Click on the Front Desk to travel to the House Call.
A virulent disease has broken out nearby! The hospital needs a Doctor to treat the infected and get some samples of the virus for studies! Click on the Front Desk to travel to the Outbreak.
The retail advertising campaign has ended. Foot traffic to the store will decrease until more advertising is purchased.
Things are alright. Have you ever considered giving us an employee discount?
This is a pretty nice place to work. It'd be better if there were donuts...
What do you want now? You're interrupting my personal thoughts! Stay out of my head and stop wasting my time!
Everything about work makes me happy. I get warm fuzzies just thinking about it!
I'm fairly happy here. What can I work on to get that next promotion?
I wake up every day thinking about ways that I can continue to impress you. I love the challenge of working here!
Can't you just leave me alone and let me get through my workday in peace?
I tell all of my friends that they should try and get hired here. It's the best job I've ever had!
You're a terrible boss. I wish that you weren't, but you are. Every day.
Mumble mumble... start a fire... At least I'd get to go home for the day. Mumble...
I've been considering quitting to go work at a call center, if that gives you an inkling of what I think about working here.
Work is what work is... It's just a means to an end for me.
I get up each day, excited to bring joy to shoppers and help them with their purchases.
I guess things are just fine. I come to work, get paid... Yup, that's a job alright.
Just let me earn my paycheck and you won't hear any complaints out of me.
I'm really just here to earn money. I put in the work, you pay me, and we'll get along just fine.
I like it here. I just have one request. Could I help you redecorate?
If hating this job could get me promoted, I'd be the CEO!
Things here are great! You're a fantastic boss and I couldn't be happier.
How am I feeling about my job? Meh!
How do I feel? Hrmm... Well, work could be better I suppose. But on the other hand, work could definitely be worse... I guess I'm OK with things just the way they are.
This place is pretty good. I have some ideas about how to make it better that I'd really like to share with you.
Things are OK. You could always pay me more money and see if I improve.
The work here is rewarding. We get along well, and I feel valued. I'm satisfied with that.

{0.SimFirstName} looks pretty dissatisfied with {M0.his}{F0.her} job. Give {M0.him}{F0.her} a promotion or give {M0.him}{F0.her} a break and send {M0.him}{F0.her} home early to make {M0.him}{F0.her} more satisfied.

The store currently has no items for sale. Click on some items in Live Mode to set them as For Sale, or restock any items that were sold previously. Customers will not arrive until you have items for them to buy.

{0.SimFirstName} has successfully performed a practice examination on a patient. The test results seem valid, but the specific data is a bit over {M0.his}{F0.her} head and will be passed along to a physician for diagnosis. It was a good learning experience, though.
The minimum amount of exam data is in for {1.SimName}. {0.SimName} can try to diagnose {M1.his}{F1.her} ailment at an Exam Bed, or run more tests for a better diagnosis...
{0.SimName} has enough good examination data to give {1.SimName} a probable diagnosis at an Exam Bed. Further testing could increase {M0.his}{F0.her} predictive accuracy.
All examination results for {1.SimName} are conclusive! {0.SimName} can now Diagnose {M1.his}{F1.her} ailment at an Exam Bed.
While experimenting {0.SimName} acquired some spare parts.
The clue analysis failed to produce any useful information.
The analysis has produced a useful clue about the crime!
While analyzing {1.ObjectName}, {0.SimFirstName} found trace elements of a different material, and separated out:\n{2.String}
The analysis has yielded useful information about this element.
This analysis may have compromised the value of the flora. {0.SimFirstName} should be more careful next time.
The analysis has revealed that this flora is of better quality than it first appeared.
The analysis revealed nothing new about this plant.
{0.SimFirstName} discovered {M0.he}{F0.she} knows all the traits of {1.SimName}.
Your recent amorous activity has revealed that {1.SimFirstName} is an Alien!
{1.SimName} has discovered that {0.SimName} is an alien!

The SimRay is an extremely powerful device. Use it with extreme caution! Things that you change with this device may never return to their normal form and may be permanent. Do not let this power go to your head!
How lucky! Tinkering with the Fixer's Luck Serum has given {0.SimFirstName} the following Upgrade Parts:\n{2.String}
Hey boss, you've kept me working into overtime on this shift. I need to head home in compliance with the Fair Labor Sim Act.
{1.SimFirstName} provided an account of what they saw.
While analyzing, {0.SimFirstName} found a new element:\n{1.String}
Additional Employee #1\n\nUnlocks the ability to hire one additional employee within the Manage Employees window.
Additional Employee #2\n\nUnlocks the ability to hire one additional employee within the Manage Employees window.
Faster Checkouts (large)\n\nHousehold members will ring up customers that are ready to purchase an item much faster.
Faster Checkouts (small)\n\nHousehold members will ring up customers that are ready to purchase an item a bit faster.
Curious Shopper\n\nCustomers will spend more time browsing the items for sale in the store before they decide to leave.
Serious Shopper\n\nCustomers will have a greater desire to purchase an item when they first enter the store.
Superfluous Surplus\n\nThe cost of restocking items is currently reduced for 12 hours. This perk can be repurchased again in the future.

Superfluous Surplus\n\nThe store's supplier ordered too much inventory, and they're temporarily reducing prices to clear space! The cost of restocking items will be reduced for 12 hours. This perk can be repurchased again in the future.
Cheaper Restocking\n\nReduces the price of restocking items.
Mega Manager\n\nManagement social interactions performed on store employees will have a greater chance of succeeding.
Slick Salesman\n\nRetail socials used on customers will have a greater chance of succeeding.
Instant Restocking\n\nMembers of the household will be able to instantly restock items.
Provocative Pedestal\n\nUnlocks a new Pedestal object to display various items for sale on. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
Register of Tomorrow\n\nUnlocks the Suros Pecuniary Cash Register; perfect for use in modern, upscale stores. It's the register of tomorrow... today. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
Faster Restocking (large)\n\nGreatly reduces the time it takes members of the household to restock sold items.
Faster Restocking (small)\n\nSlightly reduces the time it takes members of the household to restock sold items.
Snazzy Shirt\n\nUnlocks an additional shirt for men and women that's ideal as an employee uniform.
Stunning Sign\n\nUnlocks a new sign which can be placed in your store to attract more customers. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
Placard: My First Simoleon\n\nUnlocks a decorative wall object that celebrates the store's initial success. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
Placard: Fobbs 500\n\nUnlocks a decorative wall object that celebrates the store's ultimate domination of the marketplace. Check the "Retail Items" section of Build Mode.
Sure Sale\n\nUnlocks the "Sure Sale" social interaction, which guarantees a customer will purchase an item when used on them.
Alien conversation is somehow both intuitive and tactile!
The fond memories of a home cooked meal, hanging out with friends, and not having to wear this disguise. Feeling homesick is terrible.
It's probably time to rest and recover some brain power.
Must have been swamp gas refracting off of a weather balloon...
Looking at home through rose colored glasses.
{0.SimFirstName} is filled with unexplained emotion, as if hit by a beam from above.
{0.SimFirstName} is filled with unexplained drowsiness, as if hit by a beam from above.
{0.SimFirstName} is feeling the aftereffects of a sudden slumber.
There is a bad feeling about this...
Behaving like the Captain of a space journey.
They saw through my clever disguise.
{0.SimFirstName} had a brilliant breakthrough on the case.
Looks like it's not "elementary" after all.
It's a good day when you're able to wrap a suspect around your finger in the interrogation room.
Unfortunately cleanliness isn't a requirement for being a criminal.
A new scientific breakthrough. All that ruminating has paid off!
By Analyzing and Experimenting, your Sim can stretch {M0.his}{F0.her} mind to discover new inventions.
{0.SimFirstName} has re-newed focus on {M0.his}{F0.her} career after reading-up on the latest advances in medical care.
Brimming with intellectual energy after contemplating the conundrum of a hovering lamp.
Feeling fine during an interrogation, nothing to worry about here.
Nothing is quite as stressful as the cold gaze of a detective.
Calibrating an Electroflux Wormhole Generator is a great way to grow the brain.
There's someone - or something - on the other side, and making contact put {0.SimFirstName} in a great frame of mind.
While experimenting you have discovered some interesting data.
These toxic fumes will make anyone loopy.
Failing an experiment can be extremely frustrating!
Focused technical optimization yields increased confidence in ensuing results
Studying the motion of the planets brings a keen sense of focus.
Whatever it is, it's about to come out!
{0.SimFirstName} isn't feeling so hot. It must be something {M0.he}{F0.she} ate.
{0.SimFirstName} has put on quite a few pounds. Surely this is just a phase.
Something is definitely not right! {0.SimFirstName}'s changing body has left {M0.him}{F0.her} quite suspicious.
This neon sign has seen better days... Time to repair it.
Nothing gets the blood boiling like being poked and prodded on an alien ship!
Whatever those aliens did really messes with the head!
Seeing all that amazing alien technology truly boggles the mind... even when it's being used on you!
I'm so lonely... my social is decaying.
Don't bet on anything going right.
{0.SimFirstName} is feeling HOT! Hot as in hot and bothered, but also hot like ACTUALLY SETTING THINGS ON FIRE!
My achy breaky heart. This is not the time to be romantic.
Do You Know Who I Am?
Can only be cured by more cowbell.
You're so lucky you get extra salvage parts from Tinkering or Salvaging Parts, and you can repair things lighting-quick.
Is there anything that could be more angry than 1000 angry oxen?
Nothing says feeling better quite like not actually feeling better.
Seems like no matter how much you eat, the hunger remains.
Smelling so good that Sims can't stop flirting.
It's clear that when drinking serums, bad plus bad equals much more bad.
Immortality. The best use of science!
The key to hiding is not being seen.
Great patient care braises the right (and left) cardiac ventricles.
Confused by the medical data, {0.SimFirstName} may need a second opinion on "how not to be a bad doctor."
Renewed energy and thoroughly scrubbed genetic material are two benefits {0.SimFirstName} has gained from being decontaminated.
Sometimes simple home remedies are the best medicine.
There's a party inside {0.SimFirstName}'s face, with the sole intent of trashing the place.
{0.SimFirstName} can't tell if it's {M0.him}{F0.her}, or the rest of the world that's spinning.
{0.SimFirstName} is hot, like super-hot, and not that good, ready-for-{M0.his}{F0.her}-close-up kinda way
{0.SimFirstName} is fighting a battle of the belly... and losing epically.
{0.SimFirstName}'s head is a little like a teapot: short, stout and all steamed up!
Uncontrollable laughs are only funny for so long.
{0.SimFirstName}'s brain feels about 3 1/2 sizes too large for the head-space provided.
It feels as if there is a swarm of invisible insects marching all over {0.SimFirstName}'s skin.
Seeing stars is usually a good thing, except when you're the only one that does.
The sudden lack of symptoms and potency of the medication has given {0.SimFirstName} a brief burst of curative energy
This is {0.SimFirstName}. This is {0.SimFirstName} on prescription drugs. Any questions?
This Sim has been frozen. Yes, very much so.
Time to clean, time to clean. Where can I find more dirt?
Mmmm... Food sounds good. Very good.
Standing is just too much work. Plus, chairs are pretty.
I love beds. I should sleep.
That invention is so deliciously entertaining.
Sometimes a different perspective is just what you need.
These images seem like something from another world. Could it be?
I Fell Down, A Wellness Center
Duty calls! The world is a never-ending cesspool of grime & crime and it’s time for {0.SimFirstName} to take a big bite out of it! Sounds gross. Care to join them or should they go to work alone?
{0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. Adding a little more shine to the badge and pep in the step might help.
{0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. There may be a shinier badge and new title in {M0.his}{F0.her} future...
{0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. The citizens of this community will surely appreciate {M0.his{PF0.her} desire to protect and serve!
{0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Crime will surely flourish due to such negligence.
{0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Hopefully no patients suffered due to {M0.his}{F0.her} negligence.
{0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. Preventative care is the best course, so {M0.he}{F0.she} needs to step up!
{0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. Promotions and community health are surely in the future!
{0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. {M0.He}{F0.She} can really turn this clinic into a beacon for the community!
{0.SimFirstName} did an Adequate Job today. The beaker was half full. That can be said at least.
{0.SimFirstName} did a Fantastic Job today. It won’t be long before academic prestige and scientific achievements arrive!
{0.SimFirstName} did a Good Job today. Discoveries and industrious science were made aplenty!
{0.SimFirstName} did a Terrible Job today. Let’s all hope no lab experiments exploded and no extra-terrestrials infiltrated the neighborhood.
Aiming to become a Doctor? Well it all starts with patient care. Even powerful physicians started by making beds, delivering food and listening to sick Sims’ woes.
In addition to the basics of health-care, aspiring medical professionals must know the ins-and-outs of the hospital venue. For example, in with new patients, and out with the messes they create.
X-Ray Machines are now available for use at work to scan and exam patients
Being exposed to a variety of illnesses does have its benefits... You may be perpetually covered in germs, but you also now know what to look for in your patient examinations.
Medical Treadmills can now be used further examine patients' conditions

One of the best parts of working in the medical field, is the ability to “play” around with all the nifty examination gadgets, like X-ray machines and medical treadmills. Playing in the name of health-care, of course.
Surgery Tables at work can now be used to treat the most severe patient conditions

Entering into a nursing role, you have the widest and most vital range of responsibilities. A workday can consist of quality patient care, operating an array medical technology and maintaining good sanitary conditions around the hospital.

Your commitment to health-care is second to none. As a result, you have risen to the indispensable role of nursing leadership. High-ranking doctors may have great theoretical knowledge of treatment, but the hospital would certainly grind to a halt without your practiced supervision.

You’ve made it! After immeasurable days and focused effort, you’re officially a primary care physician. However, being a generalist is just the first step along an elite and illustrious path of medical specialization.

Going beyond the routine duties of a general physician, you have begun to specialize in expert care of patients; everything from treating their most severe conditions to bringing new Sim life into the world.

As a Surgeon, you hold life-and-death of your Sim-charges in steady, skilled hands. Nothing in the practice of medicine is beyond your ability. As such, few other professionals are as deservingly revered and celebrated as those in your elite role.
{0.SimFirstName}'s has unlocked the "General Hospital" Styled Room.

You’ve reached the rarified heights of your profession and are the pinnacle of expert medical knowledge and training. Your lucrative talents are wasted on all but the biggest challenges of theoretical diagnostics and overseeing the entire hospital complex.

{0.SimFirstName}'s dreaming of a life fighting crime and solving cases. But, you have to learn to walk before you can run. {M0.His}{F0.Her} responsibilities as a Cadet are to first assist other detectives with their case work.
The training wheels are off. {0.SimFirstName} is a full fledged officer of the law.
{0.SimFirstName}'s senses have heightened when Searching for Clues.
{0.SimFirstName} has proven worthy of the title Corporal. Keep up the good work.
Will you aspire to be the best of the best like Holmes? Or more of a Clouseau? Only time will tell.
{0.SimFirstName} has proven very capable and has achieved the rank of Senior Detective. Leave no stone unturned in your investigations.

Sergeant: Latin for "one who serves." When you are face to face with the scum of the earth day in and day out, it's easy to lose faith in humanity. Remember there are good people out there worth helping.
{0.SimFirstName}'s now has vivid senses when Searching for Clues.
Lieutenant {0.SimLastName}. Are you in the pocket of your superiors? Or will you align with your subordinates and facilitate some real, honest police work?
Oh captain! My captain! At least the fellas didn't wait until your passing to write a poem about you. Hopefully the next one will be suitable outside of a restroom wall.
{0.SimFirstName} has become an indispensable part of law enforcement. Juke the stats? Or play is straight, colonel?
{0.SimFirstName}'s has unlocked the "Real Detective Suite" Styled Room.
{0.SimFirstName}'s has climbed to the top. Chief. That has a nice ring to it. But, don't let your senses dull or get too comfortable behind a desk. Get out there and lead by example!
Want to be a scientist you say? Everyone needs to start somewhere. Learning the ins and the outs of the science lab is always a great start.
We know there are unidentified lifeforms living amongst us. They may hold the technology that will accelerate FutureSim Labs leaps and bounds beyond the competition. It's up to you to discover it.
Time to stretch your mind and think outside the box. FutureSim Labs only employs the most creative minds to create the next big thing in science.
Stingrams, Ploobits, Quamarts, and Grooflets. Only a true tinkerer can see the hidden potential of these parts.
Liquids, Powders, and Boom! Creating new serums can be fun, but combining their effects can be out of this world!
As the Research and Development Lead, it is up to you to make sure FutureSim Labs stays at the forefront of scientific innovation.
Top secret studies have shown that alien life amongst us could be a possibility. Before we can completely confirm these claims we need more proof!
As you move up the ranks at FutureSim Labs you start to take on more responsibilities. Now you have the power to give orders to Co-workers!
You have proven your worth at FutureSim Labs. Because of your hard work, we are now at the forefront of technological innovation. It is your job now to make sure we do not fall behind.

There comes a time in every scientist life when they must decide whether to use their knowledge for good or for evil. This path is never a clear one, this path is chosen based upon your everyday actions!

Who doesn’t want to be held responsible for another Sim’s health and well-being? A Doctor who can advance in the medical ranks will find themselves rewarded with objects like a Standing Surgical Light and a Full-Sized Skeleton to brighten up the home nursery. To make the deal extra sweet, you’ll be able to unlock your very own Hospital Scrubs and Patient Gowns so you can play Doctor at home!

Do you want to be the type of cop who’s never really off-duty? If so, this job’s for you and we’ve got the rewards to support that unhealthy lifestyle! Unlock outfits like your Police Uniform to wear as pajamas. Teach your teen a valuable lesson for that C+ by dressing them in Prisoner Coveralls and transforming their bedroom into a virtual jail cell complete with Prison Bar Walls and a decorative Security Camera. As a bonus, you can keep an eye on them with your very own One-Way Mirror.

Calling all brains! Are you the nerdy type who aspires to one day wear tin foil on your head and decorate your studio with huge bubbly tanks? A Scientist who proves they’ve got the gray matter to change the world as we know it can unlock new outfits like the UFO hunter or objects like a swanky Chemistry Lab for concocting new inventions and serums.
{0.SimFirstName}’s hospital shift is starting now. Care to join {M0.him}{F0.her} or should {0.SimFirstName} go to work alone?
Trusty Notepad in hand, it’s time for {0.SimFirstName} to go work at the Lab. Maybe today is the day for a major breakthrough!? Care to join them or should they go to work alone?
Unlock by reaching level 4 of the Detective career.
Unlocked at level 4 of the Detective career.

With clear walls but sturdy construction. This fence will entice shoppers to come in your store and buy all the things inside. You can also use in your lot to provide your home with a flair or modernity worthy of Simchectural Digest.

Built from sturdy nylon roping and even sturdier plastic posts, placing this specialized indoor fencing just screams "form a line here." No unruly Sims or out-of-control mobs to be seen here. No, no. You made a line.

This railing should keep you from falling over the edge into a vat of questionable liquid and turning into a supervillain. Unless of course, you’re into that – in which case we included some large spacing between the bars.

This formidable fence puts its best foot forward to maintain maxmium security; however, what many Sims don't realize until it's too late, is that this fence isn't designed to keep others out. It's meant to make sure things stay IN.
For Your Protection Chain Link Fence
Made from reinforced steel, this honeycomb design helps make any police station feel safe, while maintaining a modicum of modernity.
"Can't Find Anything On This" Linoleum Floor
This ultra advanced piece of technology allows brave Sims to travel to an alien world filled with exotic and interesting things. Hopefully, you can find a way back home once you go through.

The awning is the ideal architectural landmark that allows sweet storied moments such as: The goodbye, hopefully with a kiss, or the greeting, ideally with a firm handshake. Why settle for grand alohas under anything less than the Falutenous Awning?
Get ready to adorn the walls of your very own brick and mortar with this fun and whimsical awning! With its multiple color options you can make your walls look like a candy cane or maybe a zebra!
A sleek and stunning bassinet to hold your precious. Comes with a padded mattress and hi-tech poop resistant sheet to keep the little one comfortable. *As seen on TV*
Stark, plain, and awfully uncomfortable, it is hard to tell if this mattress is merely firm or stuffed with rocks.

By: The Swedish Chef \n\nMost expert bakers believe that once the baked good is in the oven, your job is done. What they don't know is that there is a secret science to the act of waiting for a baked good to finish. A secret only The Swedish Chef knew...until now! Learn more about this amazing secret inside!

By: Frank Oz \n\nNailing down the ideal shape for a baked good can be a tricky endeavor. Should this cookie be a circle? Triangle? Tetrahedron? Frank Oz explains the optimal shape for a variety of baked goods using a formula he created himself. Read on to discover the mathematical formula that's rocking the world of modern baking!

In the time of glorious Emperors, few of whom could read, there was one that had a spine…of a book! Libraer championed books throughout the Empire, though was a poor architect, which is why we celebrate with this IV best shelving apparatus.

Antique? Sophisticated? Modern? Not for you! You just want a place to store stuff, no nonsense, no floral mumbo jumbo, no flair, glitz, or glam. The Rectangle with Shelves Bookshelf is perfect for those who don't have time for complicated furniture to have a work appropriate environment.
True bibliophiles will swoon over the sturdy construction and sleek design of this bookcase. Stack them side by side to create aisles of beloved best sellers.
Processing your suspect is a must during the apprehension of a person of interest. Use this sturdy Booking Station to gather all the information needed from your incoming perp.

By: Bill Barretta \n\nNever before has pouring several things into a bowl and stirring with a mixer been as carefully explained as Bill Barretta has done with this instructional book. A must have paperweight for any new baker!
A large dose of potent panacea to cure even the severest of sickness.

The bars on this wall are made of titanium and dolemite. Making these some of the strongest bars on the lot! Create a compound on your lot that is impervious to other Sims but also keeps your Sims securely inside. Very securely!

We reinforced the titanium and dolemite bars for this model for even more security! Create a compound on your lot that is impervious to other Sims but also keeps your Sims securely inside without a doubt.
We heard your feedback and we delivered! Super reinforced bars, semi-artistic tile pattern, this model is definitely for you if you want to make sure your prisoner stays put for life!
THIS is the product to have for solving our your lockup needs. Installs anywhere in mere seconds. That pesky nuisance will NEVER get out of here. Guaranteed!
Made from Jade? Of course not! That would be incredibly expensive! No, this is a beautiful cell door to bring enjoyment to even the most jaded Sims!
It's brilliant! A see-through door! Not glass or anything like that, but an open air space intersected by bar-like metal columns. Have you ever seen anything like it?

This chemical analyzer combines the most up-to-date software and state of the art technology. Allow your Sims to get the most accurate readings on all of their experiments and be the envy of all scientists in town, plus it also has LASERS! Who doesn't like lasers?!
This Chemistry Lab has all of the bells and whistles. It has everything a scientist could ever need to create the most absurd concoctions.
This Chemistry Lab has all of the bells and whistles. It has everything a scientist could ever need to create the most absurd concoctions.

It's always on time, even when time is running 3x fast. Perfect for the Sim who doesn't understand numbers, but can count notches. As long as they can count 12 notches, they should be able to read the time on this clock.
A technological marvel, this sleek scanning platform functions as matter-replicator using Science!
A basic building block of inert elements molded into an undeveloped form.

Crandestine is an otherworldly red gemstone like nothing ever seen on Earth.
Nitelite is a fluorescent green crystal that is so bright it burns to look directly at it.

Xenopetrium is a highly volatile element. It was discovered when a child tripped over a deposit of the rare substance while trying to catch his runaway Xenoflox. The poor child was propelled clear to a nearby moon. The discovery led to a period of rapid innovation, including space flight. The boy was retrieved only a few orbits later and reunited with his beloved pet.
Looks like something messed with the wrong gosh darn rec room.

"True Blue" Xur Corbut managed to unite the ancient clans. He ushered in the modern era of tranquility where the search for the ultimate party is prized above all else. Legend has it that Corbut was able to champion the most legendary party ever held on Sixam. Everyone on the planet took part... except for one holdout. "Glumbut the Wet Blanket."

Glumbut believed that partying was a waste of time. He thought it was a waste to spend immense amounts of resources trying to make Fizzy Juice 2% more fizzy. Nobody liked Glumbut very much. But hey, they named this rock after him. That's something.
Zarinne was a legendary dancer that climbed the dance battle ranks on the colony of Funkistan. She became well known for wearing a bright orange jumpsuit which complimented her fair blue skin tone.

Burble's Brew was an immensely popular drink a few centuries ago. Anyone who was anyone was drinking it. But, before you knew it, everyone's hair was falling out. Almost the entire population became bald. Folks scrambled to cover up the shame of their chrome domes. But, Mylom was brave enough to proudly display her bald head. And, soon others joined her until it became fashionable to do so. To this day her name is synonymous with inner beauty and strength. This stone was named in her honor.

Eye of the Stormbore looks like the terrifying red eye of an ancient creature that used to terrorize unexpecting folks slumbering away in dream land. It would sneak up, wait hours, and then look straight into your soul as you woke up. The Stormbore would then run off delighted to have surprised another poor sap. Is it any wonder they went extinct long, long ago?
If you squint your eyes and turn your head, this geode looks a little bit like a snack food that became an intergalactic sensation when the Duchess of Hiattoid tripped on one at her coronation.
What lies beneath the surface of this alien space rock? There is only one way to find out.
Blutonium is an element found on Sixam. Like a deep ocean abyss, it is hauntingly beautiful.
Solarium is a beautiful orange element created by the gravitational collapse of a star.
Smoking craters are known to be home to small alien animal life.
Crandestine crystals can be found periodically emitted from Crandestine deposits.
Nitelite crystals are periodically emitted from Nitelite deposits.
Geodes can be found forming on these pedestals.

“Upstanding,” cried the floor to the column. “Be you upright and sturdy?” Upstanding looked down upon the lowly floor tiles with footprints aplenty, as all columns do. “ Nay!” it said. But, was its josh in jest? Or truth?
Sturdy, upright, 100% column. Nobody is going to tell this column it’s not a column. No, this is a Column’s Column!
Generations of mad scientists have trusted the stability of their underground lairs to this steadfast column.

Are you searching for a double door that is stylish, sleek, and sophisticated? Then look no further! The Brushed Metal Double Door is THE door to be seen walking through this season!

Add some class by adding some glass. These double doors are guaranteed for life to add curb appeal to your place of business or residence. Plus, when they come banging on your doors, you will be able to see who’s knocking.

Forever say adieu to lowly window shopping and set the tone for your high-end sanctuary. This elegant portal fixture will keep the big money in and the cheapskates out. The self-cleaning, oil-rubbed, hand-forged brass doorknobs and Ruboix high-sheen artisanal glass windows will evoke in your customers a need, nay, a responsibility to spend way too much.

A first glance it seems impenetrable and unapproachable, but with this sturdy door, you can portray an air of toughness and mystery with its tough looking exterior, chrome plates and a tiny little window for giving a peek of what is inside.

Curious as to what your crisply dressed neighbor who comes from old money looks like as a door instead of a Sim? Then feast your eyes on the Handsome Transom! Guaranteed to keep the cold out, the important things inside.

Conveniently built for heavy activity, these doors are designed to take large quantities of walk-thru traffic. Ideal for any Office/Retail business and available in a wide assortment of color variations. Simply put, it gets the job done!

What You See is What You Buy! After initial attempts to sell customers perishable food products sight unseen, the innovators and Smith and Hootson replaced their hallmark, lifeless steel doors with transparent glass. Now, customers can SEE their food before paying, a novel concept that led to a 4% increase in sales. At Smith and Hootson, we’re transparent when it greases our pockets.
Corporate Fridge Raider Revenue Generating Cooler

Your Simoleons will be well spent with this universal energy efficient fridge. Designed solely for keeping lab chemicals and pharmaceuticals at their cool respected temperature. Just don’t lock your lab fish in here unless you plan on making fish sticks.

No self-respecting public service venue can function without an official front desk. It’s impossible. So get your sticky pad in order, organize your pencil holder, and get that speed dial ready, because this is THE desk for you. No, it’s literally the only option. Enjoy!
A welcoming site for the sicked and injured. This sturdy medical themed desk is perfect for the front line of health care.
Nothing says security like a sturdy desk. It just screams, "You're not getting by here...unless you walk with your legs."
This alien flower has quite the defense mechanism. It looks like it wants to bite you.

What can you create with this wonderful machine of pure imagination? It's up to you to find out!

CAN YOU SEE NOW? HOW ABOUT NOW? OUR BRIGHTNESS WILL NOT BE CONTAINED. WITH SHEER CHROME FINISH AND INTENSE, ENERGY INEFFICIENT BEAMERY, THE BEAMER WILL LIGHT YOUR BOOK OR COOKING OR WHATEVER OR SO HELP US.

This large lamp provides lots of light and is perfect for the cavernous interiors of warehouses, basements, and windowless lairs.
Do you have questions that need answers? Frighten your foes and intimidate evil doers with the harsh light provided by this classic lamp!

Not to be confused with the momentum conserver, this simple-in-construction yet smart-looking lamp will illuminate all four corners of any room you put it in. Results vary in rooms with more than four corners.

Whether you are displaying your collectables, showcasing your art or just brightening up your house, The Trifecta Spotlight Track Lights will show you that good things come in multiples of three. Purchase two more and you will see what we mean!
This retro lamp sure makes you feel like you’re working in an old police drama. Imagine fighting crime or that you are in a murder mystery and set the tone with this simple lighting solution.

Push back the darkness and claim any spot as your own! No longer shall the dark dictate when and where surgeries can be performed. Now your Sims can perform medical procedures no matter the time of day!
Beautifully crafted and eloquently designed, this lamp post features the finest steel and durability. As a bonus, its flowers are freshly picked and clipped from the local farmer's market.
Dual-lit Ole Fashioned Lamp Post With Planter

Cha-chick. Just like that, the light is on. Pull the string and the sound of the bulb heating, the energy streaming in. It fills the soul as light fills the desk or surface. Cha-chick. Feel it. Hear it. Enjoy the warmth. The Artisan will light whatever you need from a local and sustainable starting point.

Do you sleep with the lights glaring, mirrors on every wall, and curtains wide? Or are you a lights off, door shut, sound proofed bunker Sim? Whichever way you go, The Watchful Eye table lamp is there for you, before, during, after…forever.
Dream of outer space with this adorable lamp. Fun for kids and stylishly geek chic for adults!
Made from off-the-shelf parts, this sturdy industrial-looking lamp gives the impression that you can't knock it over, or not without some significant effort.
Both an excellent source of ambient light and also a magnet for the grubby hands of little children.

Nationally certified, this heavy duty alert beacon effectively warns of hazardous conditions. Built with Electroshimmer technology, this light cannot prevent human error. Designed for flat surface wall mounting, the 88D watches your delicate work with hopeful optimism.
It doesn’t matter if it’s a bright day or a dim night, let nothing in the dark escape your sight with the Brightest Night Flood Light!
Simple yet sophisticated. Have your patients, or why not yourself, heal and rest in a perfectly lit environment with the Lamp of Health from Life Panel Suppliers.
Lamp of Health from Life Panel Suppliers
Nothing says 90s Sitcom Cop Drama story like a wall light with metal bars over it. How do they change the bulb? Nobody knows. But that doesn’t really matter does it? No… no, it doesn’t.
A combination of smooth and hard lines make this sconce something special. Discover it for yourself!

Tired of the boxy look? Go continental where they are all the rage and affix one of these charming and stylish lamps to your outdoor wall. The warm soft glow this lamp emits will sooth your soul...in a non-boxy way of course.
Once you hang this one on the walls, it’ll make you feel like a famous performer, rock band idol or your own private star.

Receive your mail as if it were a space adventure experience. Say adieu to the boring walk to the mailbox and make your Sims excited to retrieve their bills and junk mail from this marvelously futuristic box. Who knows, maybe one day it will contain something trully out of this world.

Two dashes of paint and a sorcery of color immulsifies your intentions. “Wait,” you ask. “Immulsify” isn’t a word. “Shhhh” the work of art says, extending a solitary metaphorical finger to your lips. “Enjoy me,” it beckons. So you do. Utter Confusion – art that “speaks” to you.

Escape or Exploration? The “I’m-a-Gettin’-Outta Here” poster plays to both the hardcore end of the world enthusiast, or to the wide-eyed “future is so bright” visionary in any family! Pick up one for every member of your family, today!

Sterile, shiny, sleek, and smooth…too bad it’s hard to clean the fingerprints off.
An all-purpose file cabinet for all of your filing needs! Its flat top makes it perfect for displaying your favorite plant or sculpture… and keeping your secrets.

Is your laboratory missing that certain something to make it look a bit more…sciency? This will add that element of complexity and grandeur your work space was missing to make the layman’s draw drop in awe of the sheer science!
It has dials, it has switches; it has all the scientific tubes you could ever need. Place this beauty of a machine into your laboratory or just in the living room if you appreciate science!

Its filtration system is powered by eight hydraulic pumps that provide the ultimate pressure for chemical catalyzation. Whether its mixing, cyphering, or even infusing, look no further than the Mega Pump Filtrator 2-X8. Just plug it in and it’s as easy as 1-2-3!

Are the toxic fumes of experiments gone awry starting to fill your laboratory and ruin your day? Slap a few of these industrial strength pipes down to clear the air. Just don’t point them at your neighbor’s house, unless you want to experiment with conflict resolution.

This catalytic chamber will ensure the most pristine filtration one could ever hope for. Not only does it filtrate the most harmful impurities it also can purify any chemical base liquid with its UV photon emitter. It’s widely considered as the best option for any clean freak!

This tank will hold the gas and keep it from escaping. Its lightweight design and variety of colors will keep your lab flashy and still look like it’s functioning, even when it isn’t. But shhh they don’t need to know that part, because your laboratory is worth it.

Built to withstand and withhold some of the most toxic chemicals known to any Sim. For anyone concerned they will greatly appreciate your choice for this barrel and its ability to contain Bio-Chemical Hazardous waste. You can never be too safe when dealing with chemicals so strong in smell that it stings your colleague’s nostrils.

Designed for multiple arrangements and equipped to hold all the computing equipment you might or ever need. Simply put it’s exactly the sort of organizer you’ll need for any laboratory needing functional storage space.
No more boring, ambiguously scientific crates! This state-of-the-art case comes with sweet, sweet bevels.

Overflows and leakages are by far the most embarrassing scene in any laboratory. But with Model T5-2685 you are almost absolutely guaranteed of easy and safe fluid transferring and all within standard code and regulation. Easy to say it’s the one stop for all your Terminal logging needs.

Heralded as one of the greatest scientific breakthroughs of all time, this device will keep going indefinitely once started unless it is manipulated by human hands. Too bad it doesn't actually do anything. It just spins. Around and around. Forever.
It slices, it dices, it will give your Sim super powers! Just kidding it's a box...for holding... files. Made of the finest cardboard from Eastern Europe! So exotic, right?

No need to be a dirty Harry when you have these classic police drawers to help organize crime…and paper work.

Sensitive research data is far too important to the success of an experiment to transport in a cheap dime store satchel. This secure carrying case not only looks like something from a sci-fi movie, but is strong enough to resist the most determined of corporate spies!

This tank will keep all of the high local temperatures and pressures from the precious cargo inside. With its wedge technology, it will keep a diverse amount of chemical reactivity all within itself. And it fits on a table! What more do you want?

Just one pile of these on your Sim's desk and everyone will surely know how vital your Sim is. Just be careful not to have too many laying around, or it will be obvious that you're trying too hard. Cool Sims don't try hard.
Look at Me I'm Important Folders

This chair looks great and also feels fun to sit on. Not only is it a chair, but you could probably put something underneath it to make sure it doesn't get away from you. Like, a ball or something.

Whether it be a waiting room or a living room, this chair has been elegantly manufactured to function perfectly wherever you choose to place it. We believe that it's your chair, so it's your choice where to place it.

This chair is named in honor of the late Sgt. James Thompson of the Sunset Valley Police Department - the only Sgt. to ever have met his end due to the poor construction of a chair. We promise to have made this chair extra sturdy.

Cuddle up with your loved ones as you wait for news (good or bad) in this traditional canvas couch.

If you need a rigid sturdy surface to sit on, this bench is for you! Note the sleek lines and smooth waterproof surface, perfect for sitting to catch your breath or if you just need a nap. It will resist the drool and give you just the support you need.

A tough uncompromising couch perfect for public use in an office, waiting room or well trafficked area. Allow Sims to sit comfortably but not too comfortably while waiting for information or to be helped.
Industrial grade bench. Feel free to take a seat but it won't be comfortable.

Turn up the style in your living room with this fashionable piece of furniture. Whether you're resting comfortably in repose, or trying to maximize how much room your arms have while leaving your companion to sit with cringe-worthy back support, you'll always look great doing it.

This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. The inoffensive music it blares is commonly encountered when one enters an elevator, but swiftly becomes an unending descent into madness that can't be shut off.

This state of the art surgery table restrains while it performs the surgery for you! Think of all the lives you can save with this technological wonder and all the babies that it will bring into this world!
Sleek, smooth, and shiny. These are the words that describe this coffee table best. It can be used to place magazines, beverages, lamps, and décor.

Want to impress someone? All you need to do is have a really classy surface for your heated beverages. Trust us, glass and wood are the ultimate combination for this.
A clean and polished wooden table that can be used to store personal items or documents and can also be used to display framed certificates, awards, or pictures.

With attached rollers for easy transportation for any circumstance you might find yourself in.
The elegance of this table is unrivaled, and its glass top screams that you've got class. Or maybe it's glass? I can't tell with all the screaming.

A harmonious blending of cheap sheet metal and laminated press-board, a good hallway table is a must-have for any proper office. Plus it makes a lovely “BWONG!” noise every time someone bumps into it.

This table allows a Sim to get to the Truth. By ANY means necessary. This Interrogation Table is not to be confused with the Table of Interrogation; an official document outlining the Approved Information Extraction Techniques.

{0.SimLastName} it’s officers like you that allow us to get hit with 3 burglaries, 5 arsons, and 2 vandalisms in the last 24 hours. Get back to work!
{0.SimLastName} if you so much as play one game of Blic Block, I’ll throw you in one of those cells and take bets on how long you’ll last.
You know {0.SimLastName}. I was reviewing the numbers and I can count the number of cases you’ve cleared on one hand. Get out there and solve some cases.

{0.SimLastName}, you think you’re pretty smart, don’t you? I bet you think you’re the smartest {F0.gal}{M0.guy} in the room. Well, I am here to tell you I’ve had bladder failures with twice the brains you’ve got {F0.lady}{M0.pal}.
How long does it take to solve a case? Are you dragging your heels? I want results {0.SimLastName}. And, I want them yesterday!
{0.SimLastName}, are you originally from Sunset Valley? Well, I don’t know how things work over there in the Valley. But, over here, we follow a little thing called the chain of command.
Not my tempo {0.SimLastName}. Faster. Faster. Solve cases faster!
You got a problem with authority, {0.SimLastName}? Well I’ve got a problem with know-it-all punks like you. Back to work.
You’re a real blue flame special, aren’t you {0.SimLastName}?
How many clearances have you given me, {0.SimLastName}? I’ll tell you EXACTLY how many… NOT NEARLY ENOUGH!”
Are you having trouble with the writing on the wall, {0.SimLastName}? Either get me some clearances, or start looking for a new line of work!
I’m one excessive force complaint away from asking for your badge. Watch yourself {0.SimLastName}.
I was having lunch with the mayor. And, she was furious. So, you know what that means? I AM FURIOUS! Bring the crime numbers down, {0.SimLastName}. Or else.
I’ve carried you for too long {0.SimLastName}. I’m not going to watch these streets devolve into chaos because of your ego.
I’ve got the commissioner breathing down my neck. So, guess what hot shot. That means I’m going to be breathing down yours. I want results!
You’d be wise to watch your back {0.SimLastName}. Rise through the ranks this fast and you are bound to make enemies.
You’re a real loose cannon, you know that {0.SimLastName}?
I’m tired of looking at so much red ink. Get some more cases in the black!
The reports say crime is down in the western district this month. Must be a coincidence.

One and the same down to every detail...
This customer is showing interest in a number of items in the store.\n\nContinue selecting retail socials to help steer them toward a purchase.
This customer is just looking around.\n\nLet them know about your merchandise to get them interested in buying.
This customer is just about to buy something.\n\nLavish them with a bit more attention to close the deal!
You can now Give Medical Advice
You can now Give Bad Medical Advice with Level 3 Mischief
Can Now Determine Baby Gender on Pregnant Sims
Good work so far! We're one step closer to solving this case. We have some solid intel and a good idea where to look for our suspect. Let's take this perp down!
The pieces are starting to line up. We have a few clues, but no provable theories yet. Perhaps the next step would be to round up the usual suspects?
Ready to learn the ropes, Rookie? You'll be introduced to a variety of tasks that will help to maintain law and order and improve the quality of life for all. Pretty noble stuff!
Learning the ropes on the first day was great preparation for a day of patrols! Now it's time to find out how to handle one's self in the real world. Stay on your toes!
You've completed your training and acquired the skills needed to really help this town. Now it's time to put your newfound knowledge to the test and embark upon your first case!
There's a strong suspect, but did they really do it? It's time to really dig deep with the right line of questioning to get the proof we need to seal this case!
Congratulations on your last case. Ready to celebrate with another one? I'd love to have an office party, but right now we're kind of busy trying to save this town. Stop being so selfish.
No Clues, No Suspects, No Problem

Any evidence? No. 
 Any suspects? No. 
 Any leads? No. 
 Come one! Get moving before the trail gets too cold!
Everyone called in sick! Juggle patients rounds and other tasks the care staff would typically assist in. You may need to "call in sick" too after a day like this.

It takes a while to get situated to new tasks. Complete your rounds and help get ailing patients tested for diagnosis. Your diligence will help make patients feel better in to time. Helping Sims never felt better.
Hectic Day of Patient Care Rounds
Higher work titles mean more responsibilities. Work a full day doing examinations and tests in order to properly diagnose and treat patients.
New to the medical field? Take the time to get to know the people, responsibilities and roles.
Research has shown that there are life forms just beyond our solar system. Someone should investigate the strange anomaly.
There seem to be some unexpected visitors at the Lab today. Better make sure they do not cause any trouble.
Today could be the day for a new Breakthrough! Start experimenting to get the wheels turning.
It is time to see what this SimRay is really capable of.
FutureSim Labs seems to be running low on supplies. Today is the day to restock and see what new materials we can find in the world.
There comes a time in every good scientists career when they have to make a choice. Will they use their knowledge for Good or Evil?

Tired of waiting for proper medical care, a patient has taken their health needs elsewhere - likely into their own untrained hands. May need to pick up the pace at work or patients will continue to leave.

Patient Neglect! After being ignored for over an hour by hospital staff, the collapsed Sim begrudgingly picked themselves up and left the hospital. Hopefully they will be ok. Why didn't you help them?
A pregnant patient could not wait any longer to be admitted for delivery and has left the clinic to give birth elsewhere

Due to the urgency of getting the batch of delivered tissue samples analyzed, the hospital staff was forced to quickly out source this job to another lab, as {0.SimFirstName} could not break away to do this emergency work
I'd like to buy something, but I can't find anything that matches my price range. Do you have anything else that fits my budget?
There's not much here that interests me, and the sales staff hasn't exactly been accommodating. I'll take my business elsewhere.
What choice! What value! I'm ready to buy when you get a chance to ring me up.
Scour the crime scene to finds clues that lead to the perpetrator.
Use interrogation actions on the suspect until you are able to determine whether they are guilty or innocent.
Breakthroughs come from doing creative or scientific activities, like Experimenting, Analyzing, or even a thoughtful shower!
Add Clues to the Crime Map
Analyze Evidence or Cross-Reference Witness Reports to get Analyzed Evidence that you can add to the Crime Map.
Add More Clues To The Crime Map
Add more clues to the crime map to increase the chance of finding the suspect during the APB.
Add Crime Scene Photos to the Crime Map
Use the Crime Map to post your Crime Scene Photos
Clues from crime scenes can be Analyzed at the Chemical Analyzer in the Police Station.
Find and Arrest a suspect that fits the clues in your Notebook.
Get Criminals' Fingerprints at Booking Station
Use the Booking Station to get a Criminal's Fingerprints
Take Mugshots at the Booking Station
Use the Booking Station to get Criminals' Mugshots
Search Criminals at the Booking Station
Use the Booking Station to Search Criminals
Use a computer to Browse the Police Database.
Collect Clues at the Crime Scene
Collect Evidence Samples or Dust for Prints to find clues which can help solve the case.
Collect Evidence Samples, Dust for Prints, or Take Witness Reports to find clues which can help solve the case.

Nice work! Analyzing evidence from the Crime Scene allows you to discover clues about the suspect.

Once you're running your own case, you'll have to analyze lots of evidence before you can find the suspect.

For now, use a computer to File the Crime Scene Evidence so that the senior detective can take over.
Use the Chemical Analyzer to get clues from evidence found at the Crime Scene

You need to learn the ropes before you can handle running your own case. You'll start by assisting a veteran detective with a crime scene investigation. Use the Crime Map to travel to the crime scene.
Assist with a Crime Scene Investigation

Good work! The evidence you found will be helpful to the detective in charge of this case.

Once you get your own case, you'll have to follow up on the evidence yourself.

Tomorrow, you'll learn about the next steps in a case.

For now, take some time to help process criminals here at the station.
File Crime Scene Evidence at a Computer
Use a Computer to turn in the clues you found at the crime scene.
Get to know the community by chatting with civilians.
Talk with other officers to share ideas about your case.
Use the Computer to Cross Reference Photos or Witness Reports. You might find pertinent information for your case.
{0.SimFirstName} has been assigned a new case! Use the Crime Map to travel to the scene of the crime and start the investigation.
Use a computer to Get a Case Assignment.
Collect More Clues at the Crime Scene
Check in with the chief at the police station. Hopefully by now you're tough enough to take a brow beating.
Take a Police Report from a Civilian
Civilians come to the station to report crimes. Talk with them to get their report on file.
It's important to stay fit! Exercise in the gym upstairs or go jogging.
The Crime Map can be used to Go to Crime Scenes.
After arresting a suspect you can use the interrogation tables to interrogate them.
Use the Crime Map to issue an APB. The more clues you add before issuing the APB, the better chance you'll have to catch the suspect.
Issue a citation to Sims who are littering or fighting.
Issue a citation to a Sim that has recently been in a fight.
When you are ready, click on your Sim to Return to the Police Station
Click on the suspect to lock them up.
Spending time on patrol is a chance to help the community... or to shrug off your duty and have fun. Your choice.
Question Citizens to Find the Suspect
The suspect is innocent. Click on them to release them.
Help build a positive relationship between the community and the police.
{0.SimFirstName} has set up the map for the newest case. Now would be a good time to travel to the first crime scene.
Set up the crime map for the current case.
Patrol the streets to improve community relationships and issue citations.
Look for evidence of the crime, then Take a Picture to gather info for your case.
Get a Report from a Witness
Talk to witnesses to get a report on the crime.
Refer Patient into an Exam Bed
Analyze the Patient's Swabbed Sample at the Chemical Analyzer.
A dirty lab station leads to an unhygienic work environment and contaminated data
Sharpen those organic-chemistry skills by spending some time practicing analysis at a chemical analyzer station
A functional hospital relies on functioning equipment. Fix up any broken objects, from the Chemical Analyzer and Medical Treadmill to the work computers to maintain your workplace in mint condition.
A clean clinic is a functional clinic. Click on a puddle and select Mop.
Take some time to type up the data from the recent sample analysis at a computer
At a work computer, enter the results from the chemical analysis of the delivered samples to better prepare for future outbreaks.
Use a work computer to stay on top of the latest medical news and research available online.
Use a work computer to update the medical records of the recently treated patient
A pregnant Sim has arrived at the hospital ready to give birth. Helping to bring a new life into the world is the highest priority.
Once properly examined, a patient can be diagnosed while seated on an Exam Bed

It is important to educate patients on proper health practices while they are admitted to an Exam Bed
Check ears of a patient seated on an Exam Bed.
Examine the eyes of a patient seated on a hospital bed.

Locate a Sim who has been diagnosed with an illness that requires treatment with medication. Click on the patient, select "Treat with Medication."
Locate a Sim who has been diagnosed with an illness that requires an innoculation. Click on the Sim, select Ask Patient to Recline, and then Give Shot.
Scan Body of a patient using a medical probe to check the vitals of a patient seated on an Exam Bed.

Emergency: Analyze Samples and Record Lab. Results
Get the batch of samples delivered to reception, analyze them at the Chemical Analyzer and record the data results
Health education is a important part of being a medical professional. While socializing with patients make sure to give them some Friendly advice.
Whether you like them or not, it's important to introduce yourself to your Co-workers.
Successfully Swab for a sample on patients waiting on Exam Beds. Dropping a sample will taint the sample so make sure it's a good one.
Once diagnosed, Patients can be treated while Reclined on the Exam Bed, or at a Surgery Table
Cleanliness is critical when working with sick patients. Maintain good hygiene with regular scrubbing.
Make sure that the X-Ray Machine is in good working order. Click on the X-Ray Machine, and select Calibrate.
